TextLang.Text: UMD™
Memory Stick™
System Storage
The Memory Stick™ could not be accessed.
The system storage could not be accessed.
There is no Memory Stick™ inserted.
There is not enough free space on the Memory Stick™.
There is not enough free space in the system storage.
The Memory Stick™ is locked.
A connection error has occurred. The WLAN switch on the PSP™ system is not turned on.
A connection error has occurred. The WIRELESS switch on the PSP™ system is not turned on.
The update failed. Contact technical support for assistance.
The latest version of the system software is already installed. There is no need to update.
The system software of your PSP™ system is version %1. There is no need to update.
Connection to the server failed. A DNS error has occurred.
A connection error has occurred. You have been disconnected from the access point.
Checking... Please wait.
You cannot use this feature when displaying video output on a connected device. Switch to display video output on the PSP™ system.
System Update
Scanning... Please wait.
Network Update has found a later version. To download, insert a Memory Stick™ with at least %1 MB free space and press the %e button.
Downloading... Do not turn off the power or remove the Memory Stick™.
Downloading... Do not turn off the power.
If you perform the update, the data for [Resume Game] will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
Download completed. Press the %e button to start the update. To install later, go to [Settings] > [System Update] and select [Update via Storage Media].
The update cannot be started. System memory is low.
Communication with the server failed. System memory is low.
A connection to the server could not be established.
Connection to the server failed. A connection to the HTTP proxy server could not be established.
The download failed. The Memory Stick™ has been removed.
The download failed. The Memory Stick™ could not be accessed.
The download failed. The system storage could not be accessed.
The download failed. System memory is low.
The download failed. A DNS error has occurred.
The download failed. A connection to the HTTP proxy server could not be established.
The download failed. A connection to the server could not be established.
Currently, the server may be down for maintenance or updating. Please try again later.
The update could not be started.
The update could not be started. The Memory Stick™ has been removed.
The download failed.
Select an update method.
